googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRulesCombined:
* You must provide an excuse to vote by mail in Alabama, but 100% of voters can use COVID-19 as an excuse.
* If you are requesting a ballot due to COVID-19 concerns, you must use the "I have a physical illness or infirmity which prevents my attendance at the polls" excuse on the absentee ballot application.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: Alabama voters must include their Alabama driver's license number or state ID number with their online voter registration application.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Alabama voters must provide their Alabama driver's license number, state ID number, or the last four digits of their social security number with their voter registration application.
